methods.title: Scientists Explain Why Traditional Methods Do Not Work!
items: If you need to burn at least some fat, then you will need to invest at least 90 minutes of your day into intensive cardio which will leave you exhausted for the rest of your day.
Men are hunters and their body is accustomed to long travels. That’s the reason why almost any food stays in their body for a long time. That’s why only diets will not work as
men’s body will try to save the master and store every piece into the body.

Men may also try to choose surgery to get rid of the fat. Nevertheless, our body will define this procedure as the greatest threat and will try to restore the origin size. That’s why the kilos you lose during the surgery will return back very fast.

products.title: Men In The World of Female Weight Loss Products
products.text: Traditionally, the weight loss products were directed to the women audience. Therefore, men were forced to seek for the weight loss products by reading Women Magazines.

legendary.title: GARCINIA BIO is a legendary product that solves men problems with weight loss.
description: in The Weight Loss Kingdom of Women

title: Experts Testify That Garcinia Bio Provides
a Revolutionary Method of Weight Loss for Men!
text: No more women weight loss product domination over men!

For the whole my practice, I’ve known many ways of losing weight and the most effective amongst all of them was Garcinia Bio. One of the main advantages for the Garcinia Bio is its direction towards men’s health.
The main benefit of the chemical composition of Garcinia Bio hided in the fact of killing hunting instinct of men’s body.
It can significantly change the way that we look at male and female bodies.

Men were hunters and their body is specifically constructed to live through harshest hunting grounds. Therefore, their body is used to store the tremendous amount of fat. It was necessary to survive in the stone age, but it’s an extreme challenge right now.
The composition of gumigutin, xanthohumol, pectin, chromium and guttyferon suppress the body desire to stock fat for “hunting”.
It suppresses hunger and helps you  to burn up to 15 kilos of fat per month.
I recommend Garcinia Bio for all men who tired of buying women weight loss products.

title: More Than 10,000 Customers

Look Instagram
reviews about the legend!
review: I was looking everywhere for such a product.

You know, it seems that overweight is only a problem of women. That’s why the whole industry is directed towards “female slimming” or “unisex slimming.” No products that directed only towards men. I tried female versions of the dietary supplements and the “unisex”, but they didn’t work. Only Garcinia Bio changed my weight. I couldn’t imagine that it was possible. For now, I always use it in my training cycles. The best effect of slimming I have ever experianced.
I’ve been using this product for at least 3 months now.
With the help of Garcinia Bio I lost about 30 kilos. I attribute the majority of the weight loss to the product. I’m very happy with results.
I tried almost everything to get rid of this stubborn fat and only Garcinia Bio helped me.
My life changed for better and I lost 20 kilos! I didn’t believe that you can lose such the amount of weight without much exercising, but it’s true. I believe that it’s the best way to lose weight!

Staying in shape when you are forty is not an easy job. Your body will naturally resist your every attempt to slim down. Garcinia Bio, in compare to other products, burns fat in the desired areas of the body with no pain at all

You agree that You either have consulted, or will consult, with a physician or doctor before using any of Our Products, particularly if You suffer from any medical condition including, but not limited to, strokes, high blood pressure, heart, liver, kidney or thyroid disease, diabetes, anemia, depression, anxiety, other psychiatric conditions, a family history of these or other medical conditions, or if taking any prescription, OTC and/or other herbal medications, and You agree that you will cease immediately from taking or using Our Products if You experience any ill effects or unintended side effects of any Product. Garcinia Bio endeavors to provide You with accurate information about Our Products. You understand and agree that the information Garcinia Bio conveys about or Products and/or the efficacy of Our Products, is obtained from independent third parties such as news agencies, scientific reports, and scientific / research entities ("Third Parties"). Garcinia Bio does not warrant or represent that such information is error-free, and Garcinia Bio does not represent or endorse any Third Parties or the methods that they use to arrive at their conclusions. All Product specifications, performance data, and other information on the Website is for informational and illustrative purposes only, and do not constitute a guarantee or representation that the Products will conform to such specifications or performance data.
We do not guarantee that you will have any specific or particular result or benefit from the Product, or that your experience will match those of others who use the Product.
In each case before using Garcinia Bio seek advice from a health practitioner before use it.

privacy: privacy policy
This privacy statement discloses the privacy practices for
Garcinia Bio operated by ABIRIX LIMITED

(hereinafter –also referred to as “Company” or “We”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and encourage you to periodically review this page to be informed of how we protect the information you disclose to us. If you believe that
Garcinia Bio
is not abiding by our posted privacy policy, please contact us.

By using this Website, you agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy. Whenever you submit information via this Website, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of that information in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

Remember that the information provided by this Website is for general background purposes and is not intended to be used in connection with, or as a substitute for, medical diagnosis or treatment by a trained professional. You should always consult your own physician about any healthcare questions you may have, especially before trying a new medication, diet, fitness program, or approach to health care issues.
Information Collection and Use
Garcinia Bio

is the sole owner of the information collected on this Website. Your privacy is important to us. We will never trade, lease or sell your e-mail address or personal information. No personal information will be shared with any third parties without the customer's permission.
Order
Garcinia Bio

request information from the customers/users on the order form when making a purchase. To make the order you should provide your contact information, such as name and postal address, e-mail address, telephone number, and financial information, such as credit card number and expiration date, etc. This information is used for billing purposes and to fill the customer's order. If we have difficulty processing an order, this contact information is used to communicate with you.
How We Use Your Information
Garcinia Bio
use information that we collect about you or that you provide to us, including any personal information:
To present our Website and its contents to you.
To provide you with information, products or services that you request from us.
To fulfill any other purpose for which you provide it.
To provide you with notices about your account/subscription, including expiration and renewal notices.
To process Your order.
Where applicable, to administer Your membership of the Website.
To carry out our obligations and enforce our rights arising from any contracts entered into between you and us, including for billing and collection.
To notify you about changes to our Website or any products or services we offer or provide though it.
To allow you to participate in interactive features on our Website.
In any other way, we may describe when you provide the information.
For any other purpose with your consent.
Children’s Privacy

This Website is not intended for people under the age of 18. We never collect or maintain information at the Website from the persons we are informed in a proper way to be under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from persons under the age 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this Website, make any purchase through the Website or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, e-mail address and any other information. If you believe we might have received any information from or about a person under age 18, please contact us at
support.uk@garcinia-bio.com
Cookies

A cookie is a piece of data stored on the user's hard drive containing information about the user. We use both session and persistent cookies. Usage of a cookie from our site is in no way linked to any personally identifiable information. Cookies enable us to track and target the interests of our users in the aggregate by analyzing popular areas and products to enhance future experiences on our Website.
Usage Tracking
Garcinia Bio

database tracks the traffic throughout our site. This information is used to compile overall statistics and is not recorded at an individual level. This includes IP (internet protocol) addresses, browser type, ISP (internet service provider), referring/exit pages, platform type, date/time stamp, and # of clicks to analyse trends, administer the site, track user's movement in the aggregate. The statistics help us decide which products and services best serve our members and guests.
Aggregate Information
Garcinia Bio
uses aggregate information from demographic surveys, traffic patterns and IP addresses to customize our site. Aggregate information is occasionally shared with partners of
Garcinia Bio
to plan advertising or promotions. We do not share any personally identifiable information.
Log Files
Garcinia Bio

uses IP addresses to analyse trends, administer the site, track user’s movement, and gather broad demographic information for aggregate use. IP addresses are not linked to personally identifiable information. Additionally, for systems administration, detecting usage patterns and troubleshooting purposes, our web servers automatically log standard access information including browser type, access times/open mail, URL requested, and referral URL. This information is not shared with third parties and is used only within
Garcinia Bio
on a need-to-know basis. Any individually identifiable information related to this data will never be used in any way different to that stated above without your explicit permission.
Sharing
Garcinia Bio

uses a partner postage companies to ship orders, companies, which provides fulfilment services and a credit card processing company to bill users for goods and services. These companies do not retain, share, store or use personally identifiable information for any secondary purposes.
Links from this website

We do not monitor or review the content of other party’s websites which are linked to from this website. Opinions expressed or material appearing on such websites are not necessarily shared or endorsed by us and should not be regarded as the publisher of such opinions or material. This Privacy Policy will not apply to such third-party websites and
Garcinia Bio

is not responsible for the privacy practice or the content on any of these other websites, even where these third-party sites indicate a special relationship with this Website. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the privacy practices, or content, of any third parties’ sites. We encourage our users to be aware when they leave our site and to read the privacy statements of these sites. You should evaluate the security and trustworthiness of any other site connected to this site or accessed through this site yourself, before disclosing any personal information to them. We will not accept any responsibility for any loss or damage in whatever manner, howsoever caused, resulting from your disclosure to third parties of personal information. To ensure protection of your privacy, always review the privacy policies of the websites you visit by linking from this Websites.
Security of Information

You can be assured that personal information collected through the Website is secure and is maintained in a manner consistent with current industry standards. The importance of security for all personal information associated with our subscribers is of utmost concern to us. Your personal information is protected in several ways. Your personal information resides on a secure server that only selected
Garcinia Bio

employees and contractors have access to via password. In order to most efficiently serve you, credit card transactions and order fulfillment are handled by established third-party banking, processing agents and distribution institutions. They receive the information needed to verify and authorize your credit card or other payment information and to process and ship your order.

Unfortunately, no data transmission over the internet or any wireless network can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your personal information, you acknowledge that: (a) there are security and privacy limitations of the internet which are beyond our control; (b) the security, integrity, and privacy of any and all information and data exchanged between you and us through this Website cannot be guaranteed; and (c) any such information and data may be viewed or tampered with in transit by a third party. Moreover, where you use passwords, ID numbers, or other special access features on this Website, it is your responsibility to safeguard them.
Disclose of Information
Garcinia Bio

may disclose information to contractors, service providers and other third parties Garcinia Bio use to support our business and who are bound by contractual obligations to keep personal information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which we disclose it to them.
To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution or other sale or transfer of some or all of
Garcinia Bio
assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation or similar proceeding, in which personal information held by
Garcinia Bio
about this Website users is among the assets transferred.
For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information with your consent.
Garcinia Bio

may disclose to enforce or apply our terms of use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes. We may also share your information with third-party Fulfillment centres, third-party marketers, and third-party customer service providers.
Garcinia Bio

may disclose information when it determines that it is necessary to comply with applicable laws and regulations and protect the interests or safety of our business, customers, or other visitors to the Website. This includes exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
Special Offers

Established members will occasionally receive information on products, services, special offers and a newsletter. Out of respect for the privacy of our users, we present the option to not receive these types of communications.
Correcting/Updating/Deleting/Deactivating

If a user's personally identifiable information changes (such as your post code, phone, email or postal address, etc.), or if a user no longer desires our service, we provide a way to correct, update or delete/deactivate that user's personally identifiable information provided to us. This can be done by using the unsubscribe feature in our communication or by contacting Customer Support.
Notification of Changes

The Company reserves the right to change these conditions from time to time as it sees fit and your continued use of the Website will signify your acceptance of any adjustment to these terms. Any changes to our privacy policy will be posted on our web site 15 days prior to these changes taking place. You are therefore advised to re-read this statement on a regular basis

These terms and conditions form part of the Agreement between the Client and Garcinia Bio. Your accessing of this Website and/or ordering products/services indicates your understanding, agreement to and acceptance, of the Disclaimer Notice and the full Terms and Conditions contained herein. Your statutory Consumer Rights are unaffected.
If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about this Privacy Policy or the information practices of this Website, please contact us at:
support.uk@garcinia-bio.com
(e-mail, telephone)

Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Stop use and consult a doctor if irritation develops.
